input: user: A graceful ballerina performing a pirouette on a dimly lit stage, surrounded by a faint fog. The spotlight casts a single shadow, evoking dedication and the art of dance.

This setting amplifies the profound sense of dedication and artistry, capturing the essence of dance with an emotive and inspiring stillness.
